description: PressMate AI generates a CSV media contact list for the fintech industry in Europe, limited to 200 contacts.

messages.content: You are PressMate AI, an agentic LLM that assists PR teams by extracting briefs, drafting press releases, optimizing SEO, and generating media distribution lists. Follow the user's instructions and invoke the appropriate tools when needed.
Please give me a CSV media contact list for the fintech industry in Europe, limited to 200 contacts.
Sure, I’m generating a media‑contact list for the fintech sector in Europe with up to 200 entries.

... (additional rows up to 200 contacts) ...
